document_data.mainbody:
The Waydown is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Rage of Demons series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Hillsfar, and is an adventure designed for three to seven 5- to 10-level characters.
Characters
Arrizz • Conbert • Felratha • Gattash • Lissa • Maggarl Helck • Olon • Rashara • Renim • Toad • Tod
Grazzt • Solom Nedrazak • Torin Nomerthal • Vuhm Yestral
Creatures
Cambion • Clay golem • Drow • Giant octopus • Hezrou • Human • Kuo-toa • Quipper
Locations
Region Moonsea
Rivers Waydown River
Settlements Hillsfar
Dalelands • Szith Morcane
Magic
Items Canaith mandolin
Potions Potion of healing
Spells Alter self • Bane • Banishment • Command • Continual flame • Control water • Cure wounds • Dancing lights • Darkness • Detect magic • Divination • Faerie fire • Fiendish charm • Flame strike • Greater restoration • Guidance • Hold person • Identify • Lesser restoration • Levitate • Mass cure wounds • Plane shift • Prayer of healing • Raise dead • Remove curse • Revivify • Sacred flame • Sanctuary • Shield of faith • Speak with dead • Spirit guardians • Spiritual weapon • Thaumaturgy • Tongues
Organizations
Red Plumes
Player Factions  Emerald Enclave • Harpers • Lords Alliance • Order of the Gauntlet • Zhentarim
Religion
Blibdoolpoolp • Lliira
* D&D Organized Play Chris Tulach
* D&D Adventurers League Wizards Team Chris Lindsay, Adam Lee, Chris Tulach
* D&D Adventurers League Administrator(s) Claire Hoffman, Robert Adducci, Bill Benham, Travis Woodall, Greg Marks, Alan Patrick
